original_title: c̓əsnaʔəm: the city before the city
overview: People often think of Vancouver as a new city, when in fact this region has been occupied for 9,000 years. This film aims to correct that with a meaningful reminder of the history and prehistory of this land and her first people.

production_companies.name: Musqueam First Nation / c̓əsnaʔəm, the city before the city curatorial team

title: c̓əsnaʔəm: the city before the city
